Mail Ballot Tracker (State Website)

Daily Early Voting Report (PDF)- Coming Soon

Friday, January 1, 2024 - First day for the Elections office to receive a Regular or FPCA Ballot by mail application for this Election.

Click here for more voting by mail information

Monday, October 7, 2024- Last day to register to vote for this Election

Click here for more information on registering to vote

Friday, October 25, 2024 - Last day for the Elections office to receive a Regular or FPCA ballot by mail application.

Click here for a Regular Absentee Application (Click here for Spanish)

Click here for a FPCA Application (Absentee voting for Service members, their families and overseas citizens)

______________________________________________

2024-2027 Election Dates (Election Schedule/Dates are Subject to change)

Click here to see Elected Officials Listing and Year of Re-Election and Candidate Filing Info

2024 General Election (Presidential) - Early Voting October 21 - November 1; Election Day November 5, 2024 (Possible Runoff December 14, 2024)

2025 Local Political Subdivisions Joint General and Special Elections - Early Voting April 21-26, 28-29; Election Day May 3, 2025 (Possible Runoff June TBD)

2025 Constitutional Amendment Election - Early Voting October 20-25, 27-31; Election Day November 4, 2025 (Possible Runoff December TBD)

The below dates are subject to changes from the 2025 legislative session.

2026 Primary Republican and Democratic Election - Early Voting February 17-27; Election Day March 3, 2026

2026 Local Political Subdivisions Joint General and Special Elections - Early Voting April 20-25, April 27-28; Election Day May 2, 2026 (Possible Runoff June TBD)

2026 Primary Runoff Republican and Democratic Election, If needed - Early Voting May 18-22; Election Day May 26, 2026

2026 General Election (Gubernatorial) - Early Voting October 19-30; Election Day November 3, 2026 (Possible Runoff December TBD)

2027 Local Political Subdivisions Joint General and Special Elections - Early Voting April 19-24, 26-27; Election Day May 1, 2027 (Possible Runoff June TBD)

2027 Constitutional Amendment Election - Early Voting October18-23, 25-29; Election Day November 2, 2027 (Possible Runoff December TBD)

Important 2024 Election Dates (sos.state.tx.us website)

Important 2025 Election Dates (sos.state.tx.us website)

_________________________________________________________________________

Updated 1-1-2018 : To vote In-Person all registered voters are required to present 1 of the 7 approved forms of photo identification. If unable to obtain one of the photo IDâ€™s? You can fill out a declaration at the polls explaining why and bring one of the supporting documents. Click below to see a full listing.
